text: The Providence Journal, also known as the ProJo, is a daily newspaper for Providence, Rhode Island, and is the largest newspaper in Rhode Island. The newspaper was first published in 1829. The newspaper has won four Pulitzer Prizes. The Journal calls itself as "America's oldest daily newspaper in continuous publication". ==References== Category:19th-century establishments in Rhode Island Category:1829 establishments in the United States Category:Providence, Rhode Island Category:Newspapers in the United States
title: The Providence Journal
